B

Ball - Class in brickdestroyer.model.entities
Abstract Ball class is the superclass of all concrete ball class in the game.
Ball(Point2D, int, int, Color, Color) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Ball
Assign the properties of the given value and creates a new derived circle ball shape with the given size and color.
ballEnd() - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.game.GameLogic
This method is called to check if the current ball count is 0.
BallFactory - Class in brickdestroyer.model.entities
Ball Factory uses the factory design pattern to generate different types of ball in the game of Brick Destroyer.
BallFactory() - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.entities.BallFactory
 
BlackStoneBrick - Class in brickdestroyer.model.entities
Black Stone Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
BlackStoneBrick(Point2D, Dimension2D) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.entities.BlackStoneBrick
Creates a new black stone brick shape with the given position, size and the behavior defines in the superclass.
Brick - Class in brickdestroyer.model.entities
Abstract Brick class is the superclass of all concrete brick class in the game.
Brick(String, Point2D, Dimension2D, Color, Color, int) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Brick
Creates a new brick shape with the given name, size, color, position and strength properties.
